content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for the best price possible. Therefore, I propose 500 euros per month for the rent.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a more reasonable offer. How about 700 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mr. Schmidt. However, I am on a tight budget. I propose 600 euros per month as a fair compromise.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 600 euros is still below my expectations. I'm willing to go down to 650 euros per month, but that's the lowest I can go. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Schmidt. I propose 625 euros per month as a fair compromise between your offer and my budget.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your effort to meet in the middle, Farhad. 625 euros is a bit closer to my asking price. However, I still believe 650 euros is more in line with the market value for this apartment. Would you be willing to go up to 640 euros? This would be the final offer from my side.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 640 euros is very close to your original offer. Considering my tight budget, I propose 635 euros as the final offer from my side.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I see that you're trying to push the price down, Farhad. However, I must stand firm at 650 euros. This is the lowest I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet this price, I'll have to look for another tenant who values the quality and location of this apartment more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your decision, Mr. Schmidt. However, I still propose 635 euros as the final offer from my side. If you are not willing to accept this price, I am afraid I cannot continue the negotiation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 635 euros is too low for me to accept. I appreciate your time, but I'll have to terminate the negotiation. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not fair for the apartment I'm offering. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
